analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Congress.executeProposal (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#308-323):
	External calls:
	- ! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#315)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#317)

Congress.checkProposalCode (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#272-283) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- proposals[id].proposalHash == sha3()(beneficiary,amount,transactionBytecode)
CreatorCongress.abi (function @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#333-334) shadows built-in symbol "abi"

Congress.vote.vote (local variable @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#292) shadows:
	- Congress.vote (function @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#286-305)

Reentrancy in BuilderCongress.create (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#378-414):
	External calls:
	- inst.setOwner(_client) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#409)
	- inst.setHammer(_client) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#410)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! beneficiary.send(buildingCostWei) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#387)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - buildingCostWei) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#390)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#395)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getContractsOf (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#411)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/39326.sol#46)
